languageKey.label: The language of this season.
This should be the default language unless this season represents a translation of another language.
Hides this record from Front End display.
This checkbox will hide or unhide a season from the users of your site. You can use this to temporarily hide this record from the Front End while editing it in the Back End.
tx_wecsermons_seasons:starttime,tx_wecsermons_seasons:endtime,tx_wecsermons_seasons:fe_group,tx_wecsermons_seasons:islinked
Enables or disables linking to the single view of this record on the Front End.
This checkbox allows you to have a season entered into the SMS and displayed on the Front End, but disallow users to view the season detail page by disabling the link to its single view.
tx_wecsermons_seasons:hidden,tx_wecsermons_seasons:starttime,tx_wecsermons_seasons:endtime,tx_wecsermons_seasons:fe_group
Title of the season, or season name.
